about_the_game:
“*Isekai* MonstersPACK Fantasy Demi-Human” is an exciting resource pack packed with iconic monsters from fantasy worlds!

Goblins, orcs, ogres, kobolds... all the classic creatures you’d expect to encounter in any great fantasy or Isekai adventure.

Ready to battle them? Or maybe strike up a conversation? Either way, the adventure awaits!

*******************************************

enemies : 31 (including color variations)

sv_enemies : 31 (including color variations and includes same files as enemies)

faces : 4 sheets of 31 (1 type per character, with color variations)

pictures: 31 (1 type per character, with color variations)

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Goblins, orcs, ogres, kobolds... all the classic creatures you’d expect to encounter in any great fantasy or Isekai adventure.

Ready to battle them? Or maybe strike up a conversation? Either way, the adventure awaits!
